featured.text: Second, once a bug bomb is used, every surface in your home will be covered with the toxic pesticide.
When you use a bug bomb, a chemical mixture rains down on your counters, furniture, floors, and walls, leaving behind oily and toxic substances.

definition.zh_def: 有毒的，能引起傷害或疾病的。
definition.en_def: Harmful or poisonous, capable of causing injury or illness.
definition.example: The toxic fumes from the factory made the air unsafe to breathe.
